articles.title: Facebook Avatar: How to make your very own Facebook avatar emoji - Express
articles.description: FACEBOOK'S new avatars have taken the world by storm, with people posting their custom-made emojis to the social media platform in the absence of physical interaction. How do you make your own Facebook avatar?
